name: Pocket Agent: Mr Bullet
description:
A top duel of SOF is coming soon.
You will play as a SOF to take weapons to tackle robbers.
This will be a battle filled with guns and blades.

In the arena of survial and death, only strong people can survive!

Gameplay:
1. Play as SOF to destroy robbers or tackle bombs.
2. Random tools will drop in map. Don't miss them~
3. Also unique battle mode and blast mode.
